data.eml:eml: Collecting individual observations of Charales. Herbarium specimens must be provided when a new location is reported.Dataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nlApart from these selection plots, other square kilometre plots are also examined, preferably in areas for which there is no inventory data.Positive observations without zeros.10,399 records (March 2018)https://www.ndff.nl/overdendff/validatie/protocollen/12-011-kranswieren-inventariseren-en-verzamelen/
